Text: Form of OM Agreement Cc I appreciate everyones patience in waiting for it but as you will see alot needed to be changed based upon the parties discussions The revised agreement contemplates attaching as Schedule coal testing and Btu adjustment provisions which I would prepare based upon whatever Enron engineers come up with on these issues Please note that I have incorporated the insurance provisions that were just emailed to me but they require some cleaning up Please also note that contrary to what we were saying yesterday the respective owners would not be able to execute the OM agreements on Monday because Enron would not control those entities then Only when the closing occurs and Enron takes control of the owners would they have the authority to sign on behalf of those entities In any event as I mentioned yesterday my home number is If you cannot reach me at work please try me there Best regards David W Locascio Bracewell Patterson LLP Louisiana Suite Houston Texas phone fax email CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE This message is being sent by or on behalf of a lawyer It is intended exclusively for the individual or entity to which it is addressed This communication may contain information that is proprietary privileged or confidential or otherwise legally exempt from disclosure If you are not the named addressee you are not authorized to read print retain copy or disseminate this message or any part of it If you have received this message in error please notify the sender immediately by email and delete all copies of the message OPERATION AND MAINTENENCE AGREEMENTdoc

Form of OM Agreement Cc Musselwhite If you could give the attached document to Mr Jerry Campbell when he is in your offices today I would appreciate If you could ask him to especially focus on Schedule coal testing and Btu adjustment provisions I would appreciate that as well If you have any questions about the foregoing please do not hesitate to call me at Best regards David W Locascio Bracewell Patterson LLP Louisiana Suite Houston Texas phone fax email CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE This message is being sent by or on behalf of a lawyer It is intended exclusively for the individual or entity to which it is addressed This communication may contain information that is proprietary privileged or confidential or otherwise legally exempt from disclosure If you are not the named addressee you are not authorized to read print retain copy or disseminate this message or any part of it If you have received this message in error please notify the sender immediately by email and delete all copies of the message OPERATION AND MAINTENENCE AGREEMENTdoc

OM Agreement Cc Attached is the revised agreement with the changes we discussed Please note that under Capacity Target definition I have put a seperate table for each facility When we produce the seperate actual agreements for the respective facilities I will delete the table for the other facility I am available to discuss at your convenience Best regards David W Locascio Bracewell Patterson LLP Louisiana Suite Houston Texas phone fax email CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE This message is being sent by or on behalf of a lawyer It is intended exclusively for the individual or entity to which it is addressed This communication may contain information that is proprietary privileged or confidential or otherwise legally exempt from disclosure If you are not the named addressee you are not authorized to read print retain copy or disseminate this message or any part of it If you have received this message in error please notify the sender immediately by email and delete all copies of the message OPERATION AND MAINTENENCE AGREEMENTdoc

OM Agreement Cc Attached is the revised agreement with the changes to the previous version you received redlined Please note that under Capacity Target definition I have put a seperate table for each facility When we produce the seperate actual agreements for the respective facilities I will delete the table for the other facility I am available to discuss at your convenience Best regards David W Locascio Bracewell Patterson LLP Louisiana Suite Houston Texas phone fax email CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE This message is being sent by or on behalf of a lawyer It is intended exclusively for the individual or entity to which it is addressed This communication may contain information that is proprietary privileged or confidential or otherwise legally exempt from disclosure If you are not the named addressee you are not authorized to read print retain copy or disseminate this message or any part of it If you have received this message in error please notify the sender immediately by email and delete all copies of the message OPERATION AND MAINTENENCE AGREEMENTdoc

OM agreements Cc find both blacklined and execution of the respective OM Agreements for the facilities excluding certain exhibits Jay Sonneburg with Bracewell will be taking the execution copies with him in order to get the LLCs signature when Enron takes control of the LLCs Jay will attach Schedule to each agreement which is a description of the facilities My understanding is that Dwight will be forwarding electronic versions of Schedule Permits and Schedule Budget for both agreements All other schedules are already attached to the agreements themselves Because I will be out of the office most of the day tomorrow in meetings and Jay will have his hands otherwise very full at the closing I would suggest getting with me asap on Tues if any material changes are needed At this point I would not recommend changing any nonmaterial changes I am available today to discuss at your convenience and can be reached at Best regards David W Locascio Bracewell Patterson LLP Louisiana Suite Houston Texas phone fax email CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE This message is being sent by or on behalf of a lawyer It is intended exclusively for the individual or entity to which it is addressed This communication may contain information that is proprietary privileged or confidential or otherwise legally exempt from disclosure If you are not the named addressee you are not authorized to read print retain copy or disseminate this message or any part of it If you have received this message in error please notify the sender immediately by email and delete all copies of the message Redline OM AGREEMENT for LUMBERTONdoc Execution Copy of OM AGREEMENT for LUMBERTONdoc Redline OM Agreement for Elizabethtowndoc Execution Copy of OM Agreement for Elizabethtowndoc

OM Agreements Cc find the execution copies of both OM Agreements The only change I have made is the one we discussed at the end of Section Please let me know if you wish to discuss Jay unfortunately I would just print out these documents in lieu of the hard copies I previously gave you However keep and use the budget schedules I gave you Best regards David W Locascio Bracewell Patterson LLP Louisiana Suite Houston Texas phone fax email CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE This message is being sent by or on behalf of a lawyer It is intended exclusively for the individual or entity to which it is addressed This communication may contain information that is proprietary privileged or confidential or otherwise legally exempt from disclosure If you are not the named addressee you are not authorized to read print retain copy or disseminate this message or any part of it If you have received this message in error please notify the sender immediately by email and delete all copies of the message Execution Copy of OM AGREEMENT for LUMBERTONdoc Execution Copy of OM Agreement for Elizabethtowndoc
